strapiPost.title: TV to Store
strapiPost.content:
Walmart is staying on top of things, partnering with Netflix to create the new “Netflix Hub at Walmart.” 

  • Fan merch: The hub will be a “destination for family entertainment experiences” with music products, apparel, toys, and games that go along with Netflix shows. 
  • Basically customized: There is also a plan to launch an opportunity called “Netflix Fan Select” where fans will be able to vote on future merchandise for Walmart to bring to life and to its stores. 

For more information click HERE.
